name: Hotels com Provider
description: Search hotels, see prices, photos of the hotels, reviews.  **Site:** www.hotels.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel api:** https://rapi.one

api_methods.name: Regions Search
api_methods.description: Search region, locations, city or hotel by name

utterances.utterance: Can you find hotels in Paris?

Find me a hotel in Dubai.

api_methods.name: Hotel Slug convert
api_methods.description: Get Hotel ID from Hotel Site slug, (https://hotels.com/ho219115) `ho219115` -> `1105156`

utterances.utterance: What is the hotel ID for the slug ho123456?
Can you find the hotel ID using the slug ho789012?
I need the hotel ID for the slug ho345678.
Could you convert the slug ho901234 to a hotel ID?
What's the hotel ID corresponding to the slug ho567890?
Please get the hotel ID for the slug ho112233.
Find the hotel ID for the slug ho445566.
Can you provide the hotel ID for the slug ho778899?
I need the hotel ID associated with the slug ho990011.
What is the hotel ID for the slug ho223344?

api_methods.name: Domains List
api_methods.description: Get a list of Domains, available domains code, currencies and locales

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the available domains and their codes?
What are the supported currencies and locales for hotel bookings?
I need a list of all the domains and their corresponding codes.
Could you provide me with the available domains and their currencies?
Show me the list of domains along with their locales.
What domains are available for booking hotels and what currencies do they use?
Can you list the domains and their supported locales?
I’d like to see the available domains and their currency codes.
What are the domains and their associated locales for hotel searches?
Please provide the list of domains and their supported currencies and locales.

api_methods.name: Hotels Search
api_methods.description: Get hotels by the filter. Set the `domain`, it is necessary for localization at the currency setting. (meta / Domains List). `accessibility` parameter, needed to get ONLY available hotels. Indicate the `region_id` -> use `Region Search`, check-in and check-out date, number of adults and children

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: The age of every child. Indicate their ages separated by commas. `4,0,15` -> three kids. `0` - less than a year

utterances.utterance: Find hotels in Paris for 2 adults checking in on October 10th and checking out on October 15th.
I need a hotel in New York with free breakfast and a pool, checking in on November 1st and out on November 5th for 1 adult.
Search for available hotels in Tokyo with a minimum guest rating of 9, checking in on December 20th and out on December 25th for 3 adults.
Find hotels in London with free cancellation and a gym, checking in on September 30th and out on October 3rd for 2 adults.
I’m looking for a hotel in Rome with an ocean view and a balcony, checking in on November 10th and out on November 14th for 1 adult.
Search for hotels in Berlin with a roll-in shower and accessible parking, checking in on October 5th and out on October 8th for 2 adults.
Find hotels in Barcelona with a kitchenette and free airport transportation, checking in on December 1st and out on December 5th for 4 adults.
I need a hotel in Amsterdam with a spa and a hot tub, checking in on November 15th and out on November 18th for 2 adults.
Search for hotels in Madrid with a minimum price of $100 and a maximum price of $300, checking in on October 20th and out on October 23rd for 1 adult.
Find hotels in Vienna with a 4-star rating and a restaurant on-site, checking in on December 10th and out on December 14th for 2 adults.

api_methods.name: Hotel Rooms (offers)
api_methods.description: Get available rooms at the hotel

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: The age of every child. If children will be staying in the room, please indicate their ages separated by commas. 0-less than a year
